main event: A high-ranking Air Force officer reported a sighting of a glowing bluish object displaying unusual speed and maneuverability in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia, on April 19, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5-6 seconds., The object exhibited motion in all directions with considerable velocity and a consistent course., The witness noted a sharp ninety-degree turn made by the object., Estimated speed of the object was over 3,000 miles per hour., The objectâ€™s behavior violated known laws of aerodynamics.
sighted object: glowing bluish object in the sky
witness description: high-ranking officer of the Air Force
